title: Astros Head to World Series After Beating Yankees
text:
HOUSTON—José Altuve endured the ultimate baseball nightmare. For three consecutive seasons, the Houston Astros lost more than 105 games, an unsurpassed stretch of futility in major-league history. Altuve survived through all that ineptitude and lived long enough to see the purpose of it, the only member of the Astros still standing from when the misery began in 2011.

From the depths of that rubble, Altuve emerged as the bedrock of a new foundation, the heartbeat of the laughingstock that would grow into the sport’s premier...
description: A late homer by José Altuve clinched the pennant for Houston, sending the Astros to face the Washington Nationals in the World Series.
